mapper.select: select sales_payment_date, order_all_price from (select to_char(a.SALES_PAYMENT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sales_payment_date , b.ORDER_ALL_PRICE as order_all_price from SALES_LIST a, ORDER_INFORMATION_LIST b where a.order_code = b.order_code and to_char(a.SALES_PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm') like #{year} || '-' ||#{month}) order by 1
